dataList.name: Broken Umbrella
dataList.desc: When the body is broken, the body is inflicted with 1 Damage Down every turn.

dataList.name: Ragged Umbrella
dataList.desc: When the head is broken, gain 1 Damage Down every turn

dataList.name: Last Struggle
dataList.desc:
At 15% HP, this unit gains 10 Bind and 1 Attack Power Down every turn
Newly spawned Old Umbrellas have 30% more HP. Uses 'Cries Seeking Something' every turn.

dataList.name: Vain Heart
dataList.desc:
Gain 2 <sprite name="WaveFoxUmbrella"><color=#f8c200><u><link="WaveFoxUmbrella">Protection Umbrella</color></link></u> at the start of the first turn. (Max 6)
Gain additional <sprite name="WaveFoxUmbrella"><color=#f8c200><u><link="WaveFoxUmbrella">Protection Umbrella</color></link></u> equal to the number of "Cycle Counts".
Gain <sprite name="Protection"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Protection">Protection</color></link></u> equal to the Count of <sprite name="WaveFoxUmbrella"><color=#f8c200><u><link="WaveFoxUmbrella">Protection Umbrella</color></link></u> on self.
If Waiting Skill is slotted, summon Old Umbrella equal to the number of <sprite name="WaveFoxUmbrella"><color=#f8c200><u><link="WaveFoxUmbrella">Protection Umbrella</color></link></u>

dataList.name: Refracted Rupture and Sinking
dataList.desc:
<sprite name="Burst"><color=#e30000><u><link="Burst">Rupture</color></link></u> and <sprite name="Sinking"><color=#e30000><u><link="Sinking">Sinking</color></link></u> Potency maxes out at 30.
<sprite name="Burst"><color=#e30000><u><link="Burst">Rupture</color></link></u> and <sprite name="Sinking"><color=#e30000><u><link="Sinking">Sinking</color></link></u> Count maxes out at 5.

dataList.name: Apply Refracted Bleed
dataList.desc: When gaining <sprite name="Laceration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Laceration">Bleed</color></link></u>, gain 1 additional Potency and Count

dataList.name: Old and Abandoned
dataList.desc:
When this unit is defeated, the unit that defeated it gains 2 Haste next turn.
All Drifting Fox parts are inflicted with 2 Bind.
Apply 1 Umbrella Splinters to Drifting Fox.

dataList.name: Deteriorated Persistence
dataList.desc: If Shield HP is fully depleted after using a defensive skill, gain 3 Offense Level Down and 3 Fragile next turn.

dataList.name: Solid Exoskeleton
dataList.desc:
If head isn't broken,
Body gains 3 Protection every turn.

dataList.name: Refracted Charge
dataList.desc: If target has Charge, reduce target's Charge Count by 1 on hit and gain 1 Self-charge. (3 times per turn)

dataList.name: Refracted Bleed and Tremor
dataList.desc:
<sprite name="Laceration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Laceration">Bleed</color></link></u> and <sprite name="Vibration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Vibration">Tremor</color></link></u> Potency maxes out at 30.
<sprite name="Laceration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Laceration">Bleed</color></link></u> and <sprite name="Vibration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Vibration">Tremor</color></link></u> Count maxes out at 5.

dataList.name: Self-charge
dataList.desc:
Gain 3 Self-charge at the start of the first turn.
Gain 1 additional Self-charge for each Cycle Count. (Max 8)

dataList.name: Mitosis
dataList.desc: When the arm is broken, all parts gain 1 Attack Power Down every turn.

dataList.name: Enticing Fairy Wine
dataList.desc: When Fairy Wine is on the field, all parts gain 5 <sprite name="Binding"><color=#e30000><u><link="Binding">Bind</color></link></u>.

dataList.name: Refracted Bleed and Tremor
dataList.desc:
<sprite name="Laceration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Laceration">Bleed</color></link></u> and <sprite name="Vibration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Vibration">Tremor</color></link></u> Potency maxes out at 30.

dataList.desc: When gaining <sprite name="Burst"><color=#e30000><u><link="Burst">Rupture</color></link></u>, gain 1 additional Potency and Count

dataList.name: Fairy Wine
dataList.desc:
When defeated by an Identity, all Identities gain 5 Tipsy next turn.
If not defeated, Fairy Gentleman heals 10% HP and gains 2 Attack Power Up, 2 Haste, and 2 Protection.
Expires at the end of the turn

dataList.name: Broken Means
dataList.desc: When the arm is broken, the arm gains 1 Attack Power Down every turn.

dataList.name: Apply Refracted Sinking
dataList.desc: When gaining <sprite name="Sinking"><color=#e30000><u><link="Sinking">Sinking</color></link></u>, gain 1 additional Potency and Count

dataList.name: Lost Means
dataList.desc: When the arm is broken, the unit gains 1 Attack Power Down every turn.

dataList.name: Damaged Shade
dataList.desc: When the head is broken, the unit gains 2 Defense Level Down every turn.

dataList.desc: When gaining <sprite name="Burst"><color=#e30000><u><link="Burst">Rupture</color></link></u>, gain 1 additional Potency and Count

dataList.name: Contaminating Leaf
dataList.desc:
At the start of every turn, Fairy-Long-Legs and Fairy Gentleman gain 3 HP Healing Boost and 1 Attack Power Up.
If the Clover survives for 4+ turns, gain additional 1 Attack Power Up and 2 Damage Up.

dataList.name: Mitosis
dataList.desc: When the arm is broken, the unit gains 1 Attack Power Down every turn.

dataList.name: Enticing Fairy Wine
dataList.desc: When Fairy Wine is on the field, all parts gain 5 <sprite name="Binding"><color=#e30000><u><link="Binding">Bind</color></link></u>.

dataList.name: Refracted Bleed and Tremor
dataList.desc:
<sprite name="Laceration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Laceration">Bleed</color></link></u> and <sprite name="Vibration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Vibration">Tremor</color></link></u> Potency maxes out at 30.

dataList.desc: When gaining <sprite name="Burst"><color=#e30000><u><link="Burst">Rupture</color></link></u>, gain 1 additional Potency and Count

dataList.name: Fairy Wine
dataList.desc:
When defeated by an Identity, all Identities gain 5 Tipsy next turn.
If not defeated, Fairy Gentleman heals 10% HP and gains 2 Attack Power Up, 2 Haste, and 2 Protection.
Expires at the end of the turn

dataList.name: Charmed
dataList.desc:
Inflict Charmed to the enemy with the lowest Speed.
Number of targets increases with every Cycle Count.
Number of targets increases when Fairy is restored.

dataList.name: Uncovered Abyss
dataList.desc:
Reveal body when Fairy is broken.
All Buffs and Debuffs expire when the body hides again.

dataList.name: Leading Lure
dataList.desc:
Cannot damage Core by damaging the Fairy.
Targets more slots based on the number of <sprite name="FairyCharm"><color=#a16a3b><u><link="FairyCharm">Charmed</color></link></u> units.

dataList.name: Broken Stump
dataList.desc:
When the body is broken, Fairy will have 60% of its Max HP upon restoration.
When the body is broken, Core heals +20 more HP with Skill effects

dataList.name: Evolving Lure
dataList.desc: Fairy gains 20% increased Max HP when restored.

dataList.name: Refracted Rupture and Sinking
dataList.desc:
<sprite name="Burst"><color=#e30000><u><link="Burst">Rupture</color></link></u> and <sprite name="Sinking"><color=#e30000><u><link="Sinking">Sinking</color></link></u> Potency maxes out at 30.
<sprite name="Burst"><color=#e30000><u><link="Burst">Rupture</color></link></u> and <sprite name="Sinking"><color=#e30000><u><link="Sinking">Sinking</color></link></u> Count maxes out at 5.

dataList.name: Fairy Dust
dataList.desc: When the Fairy is killed, all Identities gain 5 Poise and 2 Poise Count next turn

dataList.name: Dimensional Escape
dataList.desc:
Starting from turn 2, escape to a Dimensional Rift every few turns.
When all parts are Staggered, escape to a Dimensional Rift next turn.
Cannot be Staggered while inside a Dimensional Rift.
When Core is at 30% or less HP, does not escape to a Dimensional Rift.

dataList.name: Trapped Dimensional Escape
dataList.desc:
When all Dimensional Rifts are broken on the same turn they are created, voluntarily emerge from a Dimensional Rift.
Afterward, lose 5 Charge Count and raise Stagger Threshold by 30 on all parts.

dataList.name: Regenerate Dimensional Refraction Blade
dataList.desc:
When the blade part is broken, lose 5 Charge Count,
and at the end of the next turn, recover blade part by spending 2 Charge Count.
When the blade part is broken, gain 2 Offense Level Down at the start of every turn.

dataList.name: Refracted Burn and Rupture
dataList.desc:
<sprite name="Combustion"><color=#e30000><u><link="Combustion">Burn</color></link></u> and <sprite name="Burst"><color=#e30000><u><link="Burst">Rupture</color></link></u> Potency maxes out at 30.
<sprite name="Combustion"><color=#e30000><u><link="Combustion">Burn</color></link></u> and <sprite name="Burst"><color=#e30000><u><link="Burst">Rupture</color></link></u> Count maxes out at 5.

dataList.name: Apply Refracted Tremor
dataList.desc: When gaining <sprite name="Vibration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Vibration">Tremor</color></link></u>, gain 1 additional Potency and Count

dataList.name: Hemorrhaging Dimension
dataList.desc: Deal +10% damage after passing through the Hemorrhaging Dimension

dataList.name: Poisonous Dimension
dataList.desc: Core gains +20% Max HP after passing through the Poisonous Dimension

dataList.name: Tremoring Dimension
dataList.desc: Gain 1 Speed after passing through the Tremoring Dimension

dataList.name: Electrifying Dimension
dataList.desc: Gain +1 Coin Power after passing through the Electrifying Dimension

dataList.name: Golden Time
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, if the HP is between 6% and 24%, Core parts instantly heal up to 80% of Max HP, and recover from stagger. (One-time only)

dataList.name: Time Reversion Retroaction
dataList.desc: After activating Golden Time, gain 2 Fragile at the start of the turn.

dataList.name: Overcharge
dataList.desc: If at 5+ Charge Count at the end of the turn, gain 3 Damage Up next turn

dataList.name: Refracted Rupture and Sinking
dataList.desc:
<sprite name="Burst"><color=#e30000><u><link="Burst">Rupture</color></link></u> and <sprite name="Sinking"><color=#e30000><u><link="Sinking">Sinking</color></link></u> Potency maxes out at 30.
<sprite name="Burst"><color=#e30000><u><link="Burst">Rupture</color></link></u> and <sprite name="Sinking"><color=#e30000><u><link="Sinking">Sinking</color></link></u> Count maxes out at 5.

dataList.name: Apply Refracted Burn
dataList.desc: When gaining <sprite name="Combustion"><color=#e30000><u><link="Combustion">Burn</color></link></u>, gain 1 additional Potency and Count.

dataList.name: Returning Past
dataList.desc: If at 50+ <sprite name="AccumulatedPast"><color=#a16a3b><u><link="AccumulatedPastMirror">Accumulated Past</color></link></u>, and if Core's HP is less than or equal to 80%, Core gains 200 HP by spending 50 <sprite name="AccumulatedPast"><color=#a16a3b><u><link="AccumulatedPastMirror">Accumulated Past</color></link></u>.

dataList.name: Misplaced Past
dataList.desc:
When the body is broken, spend all <sprite name="AccumulatedPast"><color=#a16a3b><u><link="AccumulatedPastMirror">Accumulated Past</color></link></u>.
When the body is broken, all Attack Types and Affinities become ineffective(0.5) against the body starting next turn until the end of this encounter.

dataList.name: Broken Exhaust Port
dataList.desc:
When the Steam Blaster is broken, completely spend all parts' Poise.
After the Steam Blaster is broken, gain <sprite name="Vulnerable"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Vulnerable">Fragile</color></link></u> equal to the number of <sprite name="Breath"><color=#e30000><u><link="Breath">Poise</color></link></u> every time this unit gains <sprite name="Breath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Breath">Poise</color></link></u>.
After the Steam Blaster is broken, lose 1 Poise every time this unit uses an Attack Skill.

dataList.name: Refracted Burn and Bleed
dataList.desc:
<sprite name="Combustion"><color=#e30000><u><link="Combustion">Burn</color></link></u> and <sprite name="Laceration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Laceration">Bleed</color></link></u> Potency maxes out at 30.
<sprite name="Combustion"><color=#e30000><u><link="Combustion">Burn</color></link></u> and <sprite name="Laceration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Laceration">Bleed</color></link></u> Count maxes out at 5.

dataList.name: Apply Refracted Sinking
dataList.desc: When gaining <sprite name="Sinking"><color=#e30000><u><link="Sinking">Sinking</color></link></u>, gain 1 additional Potency and Count

dataList.name: Leaking Steam
dataList.desc: When the Steam Blaster is hit, lose 1 <sprite name="Breath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Breath">Poise</color></link></u> and 1 Poise Count

dataList.name: Overlapping Past
dataList.desc:
Gain 1 Attack Power Up for every 80 Accumulated Past every turn.
At 80+ <sprite name="AccumulatedPast"><color=#a16a3b><u><link="AccumulatedPast">Accumulated Past</color></link></u>, gain +1 Slot.

dataList.name: Metronome
dataList.desc:
If the <sprite name="AccumulatedPast"><color=#a16a3b><u><link="AccumulatedPastMirror">Accumulated Past</color></link></u> is an odd number, gain 3 [Vulnerable] and [AttackDmgUp]
If it is an even number, gain 3 [Protection] and [AttackDmgDown]

dataList.name: Eternal Yoke
dataList.desc:
Max HP increases by (Cycle Count X 5)%.
Deal (Cycle Count X 5)% less damage

dataList.name: Broken Sign
dataList.desc: When the sign is broken, Rose loses Max HP

dataList.name: Scattered Flesh
dataList.desc: When the flesh is broken, Core loses Max HP

dataList.name: Singular Vine
dataList.desc:
When a Rose is defeated, Core and flesh loses 30 HP.
Lose 0.1 Resistance to the corresponding Sin Affinity during this encounter (Stackable)

dataList.name: Hatred
dataList.desc: When hit, gain 1 Offense Level Up and 1 Defense Level Down

dataList.name: Embers
dataList.desc: When defeated by a direct hit, return the damage to the attacker and inflict 5 Burn

dataList.name: Blossoming Sins
dataList.desc: If at 4 Blooming Sin, enter Power-up state for this encounter

dataList.name: Boiling Wrath
dataList.desc:
During Power-up state, inflict +1 more Burn with Skill effects
If killed during Power-up state, inflict 4 Burn Count to all allies

dataList.desc: Dies when the Core of Sign of Roses is killed

dataList.desc: In a clash, Final Power -2; In an unopposed attack, Final Power +2

dataList.name: Spreading Ember
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, if this unit has <sprite name="Combustion"><color=#e30000><u><link="Combustion">Burn</color></link></u>, inflict the same amount of <sprite name="Combustion"><color=#e30000><u><link="Combustion">Burn</color></link></u> to all units with <sprite name="WrappedCurseTagRe"><color=#a16a3b><u><link="WrappedCurseTagRe">Entangled Curse Talisman</color></link></u> next turn

dataList.name: Sin-drenched Brambles
dataList.desc: Every turn, all parts gain Protection equal to the number of Sinners with the Crown of Thorns effect
